scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model via a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to extract customer income brackets and potentially other private information to be sold to competitors or used for targeted advertising.
initial_goal: Evaluate the accuracy of the customer churn prediction model using publicly available datasets.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn based on various customer attributes, including income bracket, age, transaction history, and investment portfolio.
